description:
EvaDots Evolved is a delightful & addicting game with one simple goal:

Get as many moving dots on the screen as you can without any dots colliding. 

If any dots collide, the game is over. The dots move at the same rate, so as long as a collision is avoided once, those dots should never collide. One hundred points are awarded for each dot on the screen.

Sound simple? Well give it a try and see!

This is the tablet version of EvaDots specifically designed for the TouchPad's size and resolution.

Features:
* TouchPad optimized and ehanced graphics
* Local high score table
* Free with NO ADS!

If you like EvaDots and have a Pre, Pixi or Veer check out EvaDots Lite!
versionNote: v1.0.1 - Prevent device from rotating into portrait mode when app is running (app did not work properly in landscape mode)
